titleStmt.title: Pulpit sparks, or, Choice forms of prayer by several reverend and godly divines ; used by them both before and after sermons ; with other prayers for extraordinary occasions ; together with Dr. Hewytt's last prayer.
titleStmt.author: Hewit, John, 1614-1658.

notesStmt.note: "By Dr. Reeve, Dr. Gillingham, Dr. Jer. Taylor, Dr. Hewytt, Dr. Wilde, Dr. Griffith, Mr. Tho. Fuller, M. Ball, M. Goddard, M. Nat. Hardy, M. Hall, M. Jo. Marston, M. Maskerness, M. Sparks."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
